Today in County Sligo, the surf is 3 ft @9s WSW with fresh 12 mph SSW winds, but it's looking poor overall. Tomorrow, conditions improve slightly with 3 ft @11s WNW swell and moderate 17 mph ESE winds, though still not ideal. By the day after, the swell increases to 6 ft @9s WNW, but fresh 25 mph SW winds will make it blown out. Best: tomorrow.
